title: GTA IV crack + instructions
description:
Reupload of FeD0R's crack with help:

I downloaded GTA IV etc.... and used FeD0R's crack. All fine, until I found for some reason GTAIV.exe was a CFG file. I tried to install it 7 different times doing different stuff but it did'nt work. I downloaded another GTAIV.exe and it's now working, so I've uploaded this torrent to help people who have the same problem, or want FeD0R's crack and he's not seeding his torrent :D

Included:

GTAIV.exe
LaunchGTAIV.exe (crack that bypasses DRM)
instructions

There should be a photo at the top here of a screenshot I took with these files inside. Basically, all you do is

*DISCONNECT INTERNET!!!!!!!
*run installer etc...
*When at the end of the installer it comes up with the online activation thing, copy GTAIV.exe and LaunchGTAIV.exe to the GTA IV folder
*click next, installer will finish
*go on social club, press skip login, press play, FeD0R's cracked launcher will come up, GTA IV WILL START :D

Install the patch off R*'s website if you get some problems.

ENJOY :D
